title: Picking up a Furball, After 10 Years - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Fantasy   Romance   Slice of Life
author: Gingetsu   銀月
description: A story about a man picking up a mofumofu furball that was left by the roadside and took care of it, after 10 years have passed, it changed into a mofumofu girl, then became a mofumofu bride.>
